name: UniversalBlockStateHelper
description: Extends BlockStateHelper and provides comprehensive access to all block state properties in Minecraft.
overview:
The UniversalBlockStateHelper class serves as a universal interface for accessing the specific state properties of any block in the world, making it easier to work with block states without needing to know the exact property names or types.

This class is particularly useful for:
- Checking block orientations and directions
- Reading redstone states and power levels
- Accessing block-specific properties like age, level, or custom states
- Working with complex blocks like doors, stairs, rails, and redstone components

methods.name: getAttachment
methods.description: Returns the attachment state of certain blocks like tripwire hooks.

methods.name: getHorizontalFacing
methods.description: Gets the horizontal facing direction of the block.

methods.name: getFacing
methods.description: Gets the primary facing direction of the block.

methods.name: getHopperFacing
methods.description: Gets the specific facing direction for hoppers.

methods.name: getOrientation
methods.description: Gets the orientation of the block.

methods.name: getAxis
methods.description: Gets the axis orientation of the block.

methods.name: getEastWireConnection
methods.description: Get redstone wire connection state for the east direction.

methods.name: getNorthWireConnection
methods.description: Get redstone wire connection state for the north direction.

methods.name: getSouthWireConnection
methods.description: Get redstone wire connection state for the south direction.

methods.name: getWestWireConnection
methods.description: Get redstone wire connection state for the west direction.

methods.name: getEastWallShape
methods.description: Get wall shape properties for the east direction.

methods.name: getNorthWallShape
methods.description: Get wall shape properties for the north direction.

methods.name: getSouthWallShape
methods.description: Get wall shape properties for the south direction.

methods.name: getWestWallShape
methods.description: Get wall shape properties for the west direction.

methods.name: isUp
methods.description: Checks if block connects upward.

methods.name: isDown
methods.description: Checks if block connects downward.

methods.name: isNorth
methods.description: Checks if block connects to north.

methods.name: isSouth
methods.description: Checks if block connects to south.

methods.name: isEast
methods.description: Checks if block connects to east.

methods.name: isWest
methods.description: Checks if block connects to west.

methods.name: isPowered
methods.description: Checks if block is powered by redstone.

methods.name: isLit
methods.description: Checks if block is lit (torches, furnaces, campfires, etc.).

methods.name: isSignalFire
methods.description: Checks if campfire is a signal fire.

methods.name: isInverted
methods.description: Checks if block is in inverted state (daylight sensors).

methods.name: getPower
methods.description: Gets redstone power level (0-15).

methods.name: isWaterlogged
methods.description: Checks if block contains water.

methods.name: isAttached
methods.description: Checks if block is attached (tripwire hooks).

methods.name: isOpen
methods.description: Checks if block is open (doors, gates, trapdoors).

methods.name: isExtended
methods.description: Checks if block is extended (pistons).

methods.name: isOccupied
methods.description: Checks if block is occupied (beds).

methods.name: isPersistent
methods.description: Checks if block is persistent (leaves).

methods.name: isSnowy
methods.description: Checks if block is snowy (dirt blocks).

methods.name: hasEye
methods.description: Checks if block has an eye (end portal frames).

methods.name: hasBook
methods.description: Checks if block has a book (lecterns).

methods.name: hasRecord
methods.description: Checks if block has a record (jukeboxes).

methods.name: hasBerries
methods.description: Checks if block has berries (cave vines).

methods.name: hasBottle0
methods.description: Check for bottle in slot 0 of brewing stand.

methods.name: hasBottle1
methods.description: Check for bottle in slot 1 of brewing stand.

methods.name: hasBottle2
methods.description: Check for bottle in slot 2 of brewing stand.

methods.name: isShort
methods.description: Checks if piston head is short.

methods.name: getPistonType
methods.description: Returns piston type ('normal' or 'sticky').

methods.name: getAge
methods.description: Gets the growth age of crops and similar blocks.

methods.name: getMaxAge
methods.description: Gets the maximum possible age for crops.

methods.name: getStage
methods.description: Gets the growth stage of certain plants.

methods.name: getLevel
methods.description: Gets the level property for fluids and similar blocks.

methods.name: getMaxLevel
methods.description: Gets the maximum level for fluids.

methods.name: getMinLevel
methods.description: Gets the minimum level for fluids.

methods.name: getDistance
methods.description: Gets the distance from logs (for leaves) or other distance-based properties.

methods.name: getMaxDistance
methods.description: Gets the maximum distance value.

methods.name: getMinDistance
methods.description: Gets the minimum distance value.

methods.name: getBites
methods.description: Gets the number of bites taken from a cake.

methods.name: getHoneyLevel
methods.description: Gets the honey level of beehives and bee nests.

methods.name: getPickles
methods.description: Gets the number of sea pickles in a block.

methods.name: getCandles
methods.description: Gets the number of candles.

methods.name: getFlowerAmount
methods.description: Gets the number of flowers on a block.

methods.name: getBlockHalf
methods.description: Gets the half of a double-height block.

methods.name: getDoubleBlockHalf
methods.description: Gets the half of a double-height block specifically.

methods.name: getSlabType
methods.description: Gets the type of slab.

methods.name: getStairShape
methods.description: Gets the shape of stairs.

methods.name: getRailShape
methods.description: Gets the shape of rails.

methods.name: getChestType
methods.description: Gets the type of chest.

methods.name: getDoorHinge
methods.description: Gets the hinge side of a door.

methods.name: getMoisture
methods.description: Gets the moisture level of farmland.

methods.name: getDelay
methods.description: Gets the delay setting of repeaters.

methods.name: getNote
methods.description: Gets the note value of note blocks.

methods.name: getInstrument
methods.description: Gets the instrument type of note blocks.

methods.name: getComparatorMode
methods.description: Gets the mode of a comparator.

methods.name: isLocked
methods.description: Gets the locked state of repeaters and comparators.

methods.name: getSculkSensorPhase
methods.description: Gets the current phase of a sculk sensor.

methods.name: isShrieking
methods.description: Gets the shrieking state of sculk sensors.

methods.name: canSummon
methods.description: Gets whether a sculk shrieker can summon.

methods.name: getRotation
methods.description: Gets the rotation value of certain blocks.

methods.name: getCharges
methods.description: Gets the charge level of respawn anchors.

methods.name: getEggs
methods.description: Gets the number of turtle eggs.

methods.name: getHatched
methods.description: Gets the hatching progress of turtle eggs.

methods.name: getLayers
methods.description: Gets the number of snow layers.

methods.name: isSlot0Occupied
methods.description: Check slot 0 occupation state.

methods.name: isSlot1Occupied
methods.description: Check slot 1 occupation state.

methods.name: isSlot2Occupied
methods.description: Check slot 2 occupation state.

methods.name: isSlot3Occupied
methods.description: Check slot 3 occupation state.

methods.name: isSlot4Occupied
methods.description: Check slot 4 occupation state.

methods.name: isSlot5Occupied
methods.description: Check slot 5 occupation state.
